title: Baseball Card Trading App Comes With A Virtual Stick Of Gum
teaser: Topps, the best-known of the sports card companies, isn't giving up on young people. David Roth of the sports website The Classical, tells NPR's Eric Westervelt about the baseball card app, Bunt.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
